About Me

Harrow School

I spent 5 years of my schooling life at Harrow School. It was here that my interest in computing started. Towards the final years of my stint there I ran the computer science society, and it was from that point I knew I would pursue this as my career. It was here that I took my A Levels, which included Maths, Futher Maths, Phyics & Design Technology.

Bristol University

I am currently in my 3rd year at Bristol University studying BSc Computer Science. I have taken multiple extra units including Security 101, Cloud Computing/Databases, Software Product Engineering and a pletherer of others. I am currently using alot of Java, Python and in the process of extending my web development stack.

Reliance ACSN

During the summer of 2018 I spent a week working under the penetration testing team of the Cyber Security firm Reliance ACSN. It was here that I was introduced to a wide range of concepts related to this field. I am returning in the summer of 2019 for an extended period of time to learn more about the company and broaded my skill set.

Crowdform

I spent a short duration of my summer holidays of 2018 working for the technology, design & innovation studio called Crowdform. It was here that I enhanced my web development skills by studying Javascript. I picked up the language relatively quickly due to my understanding of HTML and CSS prior to my arrival.

Who Knows
